trans-unit.source: Encapsulates the methods and search patterns used to execute a query against the underlying principal store.
trans-unit.target: Innkapsler metodene og søk mønstre brukes til å utføre en spørring mot det underliggende principal lageret.

trans-unit.source: The default page size of 256 KB is used when the PrincipalSearcher class performs a query for domain principals.
trans-unit.target: Siden standardstørrelsen på 256 KB brukes når klassen PrincipalSearcher utfører en spørring for domenet objekter.

trans-unit.source: The application may override the default value by setting the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PageSize%2A> property in the underlying <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher> object that is returned from the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.GetUnderlyingSearcher%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Programmet kan overstyre standardverdien ved å angi den <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PageSize%2A>egenskapen i den underliggende <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher>objektet som er returnert fra den <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.GetUnderlyingSearcher%2A>metoden.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.GetUnderlyingSearcher%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PageSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*> property must be set before the Principal searcher object can be used to perform a search.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*>egenskapen må angis før sikkerhetskontohaveren searcher objektet kan brukes til å søke.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher"></xref> class with the specified query filter.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher"> </xref> klassen med det angitte spørringsfilteret.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"></xref> object that specifies the filter to use for the search.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"> </xref> objekt som angir filteret som skal brukes for søket.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*> property is initialized to this value.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*>egenskapen initialiseres til denne verdien.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*>

trans-unit.source: Persisted principal objects can not be used as the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*>.
trans-unit.target: Faste principal objekter kan ikke brukes som <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*>.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*>

trans-unit.source: The queryFilter parameter cannot be null or empty.
trans-unit.target: Den queryFilter parameteren kan ikke være null eller tom.

trans-unit.source: Gets that principal context that is used to perform the query.
trans-unit.target: Henter den principal konteksten som brukes til å utføre spørringen.

trans-unit.source: The context specifies the server or domain against which search operations are performed.
trans-unit.target: Konteksten angir serveren eller domenet som søk utføres.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext> object contained in this property is obtained from the context property of the principal object set in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext>objekt i denne egenskapen er hentet fra egenskapen konteksten for standardobjektet som er angitt i den <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext>

trans-unit.source: Queries are performed using the credentials specified in the principal context object and the container specified in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement%2CPrincipalContext.Container%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Spørringer utføres ved hjelp av legitimasjonen som er angitt i principal context-objektet og beholderen som er angitt i den <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement%2CPrincipalContext.Container%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement%2CPrincipalContext.Container%2A>

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ContextType> and <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ContextType> context types, the container is the Distinguished Name (DN) of a container object.
trans-unit.target: For <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ContextType>og <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ContextType>konteksten typer, beholderen er det unike navnet (DN) for en container-objekt.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ContextType> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ContextType>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext"></xref> object that specifies the server or domain against which operations are performed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext"> </xref> objekt som angir serveren eller domenet som blir utført.

trans-unit.source: Disposes the current instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Disposes den gjeldende forekomsten av den <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Returns a principal search result that contains a collection of all the principal objects that match the principal specified in the query filter property.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en principal søkeresultatet som inneholder en samling av alle principal objektene som samsvarer med sikkerhetskontohaver som er angitt i egenskapen spørringen filter.

trans-unit.source: The principal objects returned in the principal search result match the type of object contained in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Sikkerhetskontohaveren objekter som er returnert i principal Søk resultatet samsvarer objekttypen i de <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A>

trans-unit.source: The search is conducted in the context specified in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.Context%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Søket utføres i konteksten som er angitt i den <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.Context%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.Context%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the Query by Example overview topic.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon, kan du se spørringen ved eksempel oversikt Oversiktsemnet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult%271> object that matches the query filter or an empty collection if no results are found.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult%271> objektet som samsvarer med spørringsfilter eller en tom samling hvis det finnes ingen resultater.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*> contains referential properties. For more information, see the Query by Example overview topic. The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*> is a persisted principal.
trans-unit.target: Den <> </> *> inneholder begrensning for referanseintegritet egenskaper. For mer informasjon, kan du se spørringen ved eksempel oversikt Oversiktsemnet. Den <> </> *> er et fast objekt.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*> must first be assigned to the principal searcher before the query can be performed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*>må først være tilordnet til principal searcher før spørringen kan utføres.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a principal search result that contains the first principal object found that matches the principal specified in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*> property.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en principal søkeresultatet som inneholder den første standardobjektet funnet som samsvarer med sikkerhetskontohaver som er angitt i den <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*>egenskapen.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*>

trans-unit.source: If there is exactly one match of the object specified in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A>, this method returns that object.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det passer nøyaktig ett av objektet som er angitt i den <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A>, denne metoden returnerer dette objektet.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A>

trans-unit.source: If there are multiple matches of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A> object, this method arbitrarily returns one of the matching principals.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det finnes flere forekomster av den <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A>objektet, denne metoden tilfeldige returnerer en av samsvarende sikkerhetskontohavere.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal> object returned from this method matches the type of object contained in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal>objektet som ble returnert fra denne metoden samsvarer med objektet i den <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal>

trans-unit.source: The search is conducted in the context specified in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.Context%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Søket utføres i konteksten som er angitt i den <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.Context%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.Context%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [Query by Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e) overview topic.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se den [spørring etter eksempel](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e) oversikt Oversiktsemnet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"></xref> object that contains the principal object that matches the query filter or null if no results are found.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"> </xref> objekt som inneholder standardobjektet som samsvarer med spørringsfilter eller null hvis det finnes ingen resultater.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*> contains referential properties. For more information, see the [Query by Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e) overview topic. The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*> is a persisted principal.
trans-unit.target: Den <> </> *> inneholder begrensning for referanseintegritet egenskaper. Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se den [spørring etter eksempel](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e) oversikt Oversiktsemnet. Den <> </> *> er et fast objekt.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*> must first be assigned to the principal searcher before the query can be performed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*>må først være tilordnet til principal searcher før spørringen kan utføres.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*>

trans-unit.source: Returns the underlying search object that is used by the Account Management API to perform the search.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer det underliggende Søk-objektet som brukes av kontoen Management API til å utføre søket.

trans-unit.source: The application can modify the properties directly on the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher> object before executing the query.
trans-unit.target: Programmet kan endre egenskapene direkte på den <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher>objektet før spørringen kjøres.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher>

trans-unit.source: The query will then execute using the modified properties.
trans-unit.target: Spørringen vil deretter utføres ved hjelp av egenskapene er endret.

trans-unit.source: For example, the default page size of 256 KB is used when the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher> class performs a query for <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ContextType.Domain> principals.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel siden standardstørrelsen på 256 KB brukes når den <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher>klassen utfører en spørring for <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ContextType.Domain>sikkerhetskontohavere.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ContextType.Domain> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher>

trans-unit.source: The application may override the default value by setting the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PageSize%2A> property in the underlying <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher> object that is returned from this method.
trans-unit.target: Programmet kan overstyre standardverdien ved å angi den <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PageSize%2A>egenskapen i den underliggende <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher>objektet som er returnert fra denne metoden.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PageSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*> must first be assigned to the principal searcher before the query can be performed. The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*> contains referential properties.
trans-unit.target: En <> </> *> må først være tilordnet til principal searcher før spørringen kan utføres. Den <> </> *> inneholder begrensning for referanseintegritet egenskaper.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [Query by Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e) overview topic.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se den [spørring etter eksempel](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e) oversikt Oversiktsemnet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*> is a persisted principal.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*>er en fast sikkerhetskontohaver.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*>

trans-unit.source: Returns the type of the object returned from the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.GetUnderlyingSearcher*> method.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer typen for objektet som ble returnert fra den <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.GetUnderlyingSearcher*>metoden.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.GetUnderlyingSearcher*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that specifies the type of object returned from the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.GetUnderlyingSearcher*> method.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>som angir typen for objektet som ble returnert fra den <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.GetUnderlyingSearcher*>metoden.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.GetUnderlyingSearcher*> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*> must first be assigned to the principal searcher before the query can be performed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*>må først være tilordnet til principal searcher før spørringen kan utføres.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the query filter that is used to locate matching principals.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir spørringsfilter som brukes til å finne samsvarende sikkerhetskontohavere.

trans-unit.source: The principal object contained in this property can be any type of object derived from the principal class; computer, user, or group.
trans-unit.target: Standardobjektet i denne egenskapen kan være en annen type for objektet som er avledet fra klassen principal; datamaskinen, bruker eller gruppe.

trans-unit.source: The QueryFilter can also be an extended principal type that is defined by extending either <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal>, <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal>, <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.GroupPrincipal> or <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ComputerPrincipal>.
trans-unit.target: QueryFilter kan også skyldes en utvidet sikkerhetskontohavertypen som er definert ved å utvide enten <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal> <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal>, <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.GroupPrincipal>eller <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ComputerPrincipal>.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ComputerPrincipal> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.GroupPrincipal> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal>

trans-unit.source: The type of the derived class object that is passed to this property determines the type of object that is queried.
trans-unit.target: Objekttypen den utledede klassen som er sendt til denne egenskapen bestemmer objekttypen det spørres etter.

trans-unit.source: The resulting query contains a logical AND of all the properties set on the specified principal object.
trans-unit.target: Spørringen inneholder en logisk og for alle egenskaper som er angitt for den angitte standardobjektet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the Query by Example overview topic.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon, kan du se spørringen ved eksempel oversikt Oversiktsemnet.

trans-unit.source: For more information on the extended classes, see the [Principal Extensions](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/49d1b257-d652-4224-bdae-2edabced8f00) overview topic.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om utvidet klassene, kan du se den [sikkerhetskontohaveren utvidelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/49d1b257-d652-4224-bdae-2edabced8f00) oversikt Oversiktsemnet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"></xref> object that is used for the query or null if no filter is set.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"> </xref> objekt som brukes for spørringen eller null hvis ingen filtre er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Persisted Principal objects can not be used as the QueryFilter.
trans-unit.target: Faste sikkerhetskontohaveren objekter ikke kan brukes som QueryFilter.

trans-unit.source: The QueryFilter cannot be null or empty.
trans-unit.target: QueryFilter kan ikke være null eller tom.
